ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "Vx670 Charging Cradle", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx670"), (AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "Vx670 BT Station", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx670")), (AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "Vx680 Charging Cradle", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx680 3G")), (AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "A920 Charging Cradle", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "A920")), (AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "L920", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "A920")), (AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "i7780 Base Station", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "i7780")), (AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "Vx680 Charging Cradle W/BT", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx680 BT/Wi-fi")), (AND(TEXT(Base_Station__c) = "Vx690 Charging Cradle", TEXT(Terminal__c) <> "Vx690")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Terminal and Base Stations do not match.
